scripts.updateAll: cd ./sveltepod && npm update && cd ../reactpod && yarn upgrade && cd ../reactnav && yarn upgrade && cd ../htmlpod && npm update && cd ../htmlbuspod && npm update && cd ../vuepod && npm update && cd ../angularpod && npm update && cd ../fullapp && npm update
scripts.installAll: cd ./sveltepod && npm install && cd ../reactpod && yarn && cd ../reactnav && yarn && cd ../htmlpod && npm install && cd ../htmlbuspod && npm install && cd ../vuepod && npm install && cd ../angularpod && npm install && cd ../fullapp && npm install
scripts.startAll: (cd ./sveltepod && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./reactpod && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./reactnav && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./htmlpod && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./htmlbuspod && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./vuepod && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./angularpod && npm run podiumstart) & (cd ./fullapp && npm run start)
